summary: The package supplies tools for defining and calibrating simulation scenarios used in maternal and perinatal health analyses. It includes a baseline scenario that assembles health, demographic, and disease modules with logging support, as well as a calibration helper that prepares configuration settings, generates parameter draw sets, and exposes the required disease and health‑system modules for model execution.
business_intent: Enable public‑health researchers and analysts to efficiently set up, run, and calibrate maternal‑perinatal outcome models, facilitating reproducible simulations and systematic exploration of health interventions.
